import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import './CartProduct.scss'; import { ProductsContext } from '../../ProductsProvider'; export const CartProduct = ({ sliderWidth, margin, marginLeft, carts, }) => { const { favorites, setFavorites } = useContext(ProductsContext); console.log(sliderWidth); return ( <> {carts.map(({ images, name, price, capacity, id}) => (

{name}

{`${price[0]}$`}
{price[1] ? `${price[1]}$` : ''}
{}

Screen

6.5‚Äù OLED

Capacity

{capacity}

RAM

4 GB

{favorites.includes(id)}
))} ); }
